name: Build Chaos
description:
A game where you have to build a way up, while adapting to the other player's actions.

Try to reach the goal at the top, while preventing your opponent from doing the same. The arrow next to your character shows you the direction you are pointing, press the action button (down) to place blocks or hit the other player. You can also use R or U to throw a grenade!

There's a checkered finish line at the top of the map: if you reach, it you win!

Note: this game is a prototype and maybe contains bugs!
